text: vintum vivahameacanam natattiyal pinne avan ‎aval anuvadaniyayavukayilla; avale marrearal ‎vivaham kalikkukayum ayal avale ‎vivahameacanam natattukayum ceytalallate. ‎appeal munbharttavinum avalkkum ‎dampatyattilekk tiriccuvarunnatil vireadhamilla; ‎melil iruvarum daivikaniyamannal palikkumenn ‎karutunnuvenkil. it allahu niscayicca ‎niyamaparidhikalan. karyamariyunna janattin allahu ‎ava visadikariccutarikayan. ‎
